update coal_registration, batch set coal_registration.sample_strength=#{sampleStrength}, coal_registration.sampling_method=#{samplingMethod}, coal_registration.sample_time=#{sampleTime}, coal_registration.sampler=#{sampler}, coal_registration.mining_area_name = #{miningAreaName} , batch.mining_area_name = #{miningAreaName} , batch.location_mining_area=#{locationMiningArea}, batch.arrival_status=#{arrivalStatus}, batch.batch_coal_weight=#{batchCoalWeight}, batch.license_plate=#{licensePlate}, batch.destination=#{destination} where batch.batch_number=#{batchNumber}
